meanings.definition: To express gratitude or appreciation in a superior or more generous manner than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outthanks her friends with thoughtful gifts.
meanings.sent2: He tends to outthanks others by writing heartfelt thank-you notes.
meanings.sent3: At the party, she outthanks everyone by bringing the most delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: His kindness outthanks any gesture I've ever seen.
meanings.sent5: Outthanking others is her way of showing genuine appreciation.

meanings.definition: To surpass in giving thanks or showing appreciation.
meanings.sent1: The little girl outthanks her parents for every little thing they do.
meanings.sent2: He outthanks his colleagues by always acknowledging their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat outthanks its owner by purring loudly after every meal.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outthanks any words she could say.
meanings.sent5: Outthanking others is a simple yet powerful act of kindness.
